me.taylorkelly.mywarp.bukkit.util.parametric.binding

Class PlayerBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.intake.parametric.binding.BindingHelper
      • me.taylorkelly.mywarp.bukkit.util.parametric.binding.PlayerBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sk89q.intake.parametric.binding.Binding

    public class PlayerBinding
extends com.sk89q.intake.parametric.binding.BindingHelper
    A binding for LocalPlayers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PlayerBinding.IllegalCommandSenderException
      Thrown when the player should be parsed from the Actor who called the command, but his Actor is not a player instance.
      static class  PlayerBinding.NoSuchPlayerException
      Thrown when none of the players who are online has a name that matches a given query.
      static interface  PlayerBinding.Sender
      Indicates that the LocalPlayer binding should be parsed from the Actor who used the command instead of resolving it from a command argument.
